includedAssets.title: Manhunt
includedAssets.synopsis: As season two of the gripping drama begins, Michael and his group of escapees attempt to give Bellick the slip. Meanwhile, Special Agent Mahone cracks Michael's code.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As season two of the gripping drama begins, Michael and his group of escapees attempt to give Bellick the slip.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As season two of the gripping drama begins, Michael and his group of escapees attempt to give Bellick the slip. Meanwhile, Special Agent Mahone cracks Michael's code.

includedAssets.title: Otis
includedAssets.synopsis: Mahone uses LJ as bait to trap Lincoln and Michael. Elsewhere, T-Bag is reunited with his severed hand and Pope and Bellick face the fallout from the escape.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mahone uses LJ as bait to trap Lincoln and Michael.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mahone uses LJ as bait to trap Lincoln and Michael. Elsewhere, T-Bag is reunited with his severed hand and Pope and Bellick face the fallout from the escape.

includedAssets.title: Scan
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael's most valuable asset falls into Mahone's hands, Sucre and C-Note try to reunite with their families, no matter what the cost.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Michael's most valuable asset falls into Mahone's hands, Sucre and C-Note try to reunite with their families, no matter what the cost.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael's most valuable asset falls into Mahone's hands, Sucre and C-Note try to reunite with their families, no matter what the cost.

includedAssets.title: First Down
includedAssets.synopsis: When Bellick catches up with the escapees, it turns out it isn't the police reward he's after. Abruzzi's need for revenge may force him to pay the ultimate price.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Bellick catches up with the escapees, it turns out it isn't the police reward he's after.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Bellick catches up with the escapees, it turns out it isn't the police reward he's after. Abruzzi's need for revenge may force him to pay the ultimate price.

includedAssets.title: Map 1213
includedAssets.synopsis: As Michael and Lincoln discover they're not alone in Utah, Mahone's curiosity is piqued by Michael's computer and Kellerman is interested in Sara's origami bird.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Michael and Lincoln discover they're not alone in Utah, Mahone's curiosity is piqued by Michael's computer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Michael and Lincoln discover they're not alone in Utah, Mahone's curiosity is piqued by Michael's computer and Kellerman is interested in Sara's origami bird.

includedAssets.title: Subdivision
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael, Linc, T-Bag and Tweener home in on Westmoreland's loot, Mahone sets his sights on them. One of the escapees comes to the end of the line.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Michael, Linc, T-Bag and Tweener home in on Westmoreland's loot, Mahone sets his sights on them.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael, Linc, T-Bag and Tweener home in on Westmoreland's loot, Mahone sets his sights on them. One of the escapees comes to the end of the line.

includedAssets.title: Buried
includedAssets.synopsis: The escapees find the hidden treasure, but Sucre has other plans. Lincoln risks everything to get to LJ and Mahone puts Tweener to the ultimate test.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The escapees find the hidden treasure, but Sucre has other plans. Lincoln risks everything to get to LJ and Mahone puts Tweener to the ultimate test.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The escapees find the hidden treasure, but Sucre has other plans. Lincoln risks everything to get to LJ and Mahone puts Tweener to the ultimate test.

includedAssets.title: Dead Fall
includedAssets.synopsis: With the police closing in, Michael and Sucre's only chance of escape is across river, but the water conceals a deadly trap.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With the police closing in, Michael and Sucre's only chance of escape is across river, but the water conceals a deadly trap.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the police closing in, Michael and Sucre's only chance of escape is across river, but the water conceals a deadly trap.

includedAssets.title: Unearthed
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael pieces together Mahone's dark secret, while Bellick ambushes T-Bag as he stops at nothing to learn where the money is.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael pieces together Mahone's dark secret, while Bellick ambushes T-Bag as he stops at nothing to learn where the money is.

includedAssets.title: Rendezvous
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael and Sara's reunion is cut short as Mahone finally catches up with them. Elsewhere, Lincoln meets his father.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and Sara's reunion is cut short as Mahone finally catches up with them. Elsewhere, Lincoln meets his father.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael and Sara's reunion is cut short as Mahone finally catches up with them. Elsewhere, Lincoln meets his father.

includedAssets.title: Bolshoi Booze
includedAssets.synopsis: Lincoln must leave LJ behind if he is to reunite with Michael. Meanwhile, Michael's getaway plan falls apart and T-Bag pays a devastating price.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lincoln must leave LJ behind if he is to reunite with Michael. Meanwhile, Michael's getaway plan falls apart and T-Bag pays a devastating price.

includedAssets.title: Disconnect
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael and Lincoln decide to stop running and take a stand against their pursuers, Sara breaks free from her tormentor.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Michael and Lincoln decide to stop running and take a stand against their pursuers, Sara breaks free from her tormentor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael and Lincoln decide to stop running and take a stand against their pursuers, Sara breaks free from her tormentor.

includedAssets.title: The Killing Box
includedAssets.synopsis: Bellick makes a return to Fox River, although not quite in the way he planned. T-Bag searches for Mrs Hollander and Sucre takes a leap of faith.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bellick makes a return to Fox River, although not quite in the way he planned. T-Bag searches for Mrs Hollander and Sucre takes a leap of faith.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bellick makes a return to Fox River, although not quite in the way he planned. T-Bag searches for Mrs Hollander and Sucre takes a leap of faith.

includedAssets.title: John Doe
includedAssets.synopsis: While Bellick tries to adjust to life on the other side of the bars at Fox River, T-Bag terrorises the Hollanders with his warped idea of family.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Bellick tries to adjust to life on the other side of the bars at Fox River, T-Bag terrorises the Hollanders with his warped idea of family.

includedAssets.title: The Message
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael gets a coded message to Sara that could reunite them once again, Bellick gives Mahone a valuable clue that may jeopardise the escapees' entire plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael gets a coded message to Sara that could reunite them once again.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael gets a coded message to Sara that could reunite them once again, Bellick gives Mahone a valuable clue that may jeopardise the escapees' entire plan.

includedAssets.title: Chicago
includedAssets.synopsis: Kellerman solves the riddle of Sara's key, but could it be a trap for Michael and Lincoln? Mahone makes Bellick and Haywire an offer they can't refuse.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Kellerman solves the riddle of Sara's key, but could it be a trap for Michael and Lincoln? Mahone makes Bellick and Haywire an offer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kellerman solves the riddle of Sara's key, but could it be a trap for Michael and Lincoln? Mahone makes Bellick and Haywire an offer they can't refuse.

includedAssets.title: Bad Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael and Sara turn to Henry Pope to retrieve the information that will topple The Company, an escapee must choose between his daughter and his friends.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael and Sara turn to Henry Pope to retrieve the information that will topple The Company.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael and Sara turn to Henry Pope to retrieve the information that will topple The Company, an escapee must choose between his daughter and his friends.

includedAssets.title: Wash
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael, Lincoln and Sara finally hear the proof that can set Lincoln free, but they'll need another ally. C-Note must make the ultimate sacrifice to save his family.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael, Lincoln and Sara finally hear the proof that can set Lincoln free, but they'll need another ally.

includedAssets.title: Sweet Caroline
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael finally comes face to face with the president and Sara encounters Mahone, an unlikely alliance forms between Bellick and Sucre.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Michael finally comes face to face with the president and Sara encounters Mahone, an unlikely alliance forms between Bellick and Sucre.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael finally comes face to face with the president and Sara encounters Mahone, an unlikely alliance forms between Bellick and Sucre.

includedAssets.title: Panama
includedAssets.synopsis: Sara is forced to sacrifice herself to ensure Michael and Lincoln can sail away to freedom. Meanwhile, south of the border, T-Bag leaves a trail of death in his wake.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sara is forced to sacrifice herself to ensure Michael and Lincoln can sail away to freedom.

includedAssets.title: Fin Del Camino
includedAssets.synopsis: While Sara faces a trial, Michael is determined to get his hands on the five million dollars and put an end to T-Bag's reign of terror.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Sara faces a trial, Michael is determined to get his hands on the five million dollars and put an end to T-Bag's reign of terror.

includedAssets.title: Sona
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season two finale, Michael attempts to avoid Mahone's double-cross. A surprise witness changes everything at Sara's trial, while T-Bag chooses the wrong side.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the season two finale, Michael attempts to avoid Mahone's double-cross. A surprise witness changes everything at Sara's trial.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The newly dubbed ‘Fox River Eight’ are out of prison, but far from freedom. They struggle to evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Season two of the smash-hit U.S. thriller starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The ‘Fox River Eight’ are out, but must now evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Wentworth Miller stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The newly dubbed ‘Fox River Eight’ are out of prison, but far from freedom. They struggle to evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Season two of the smash-hit U.S. thriller starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.

includedIn.title: Prison Break
includedIn.synopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.
